title: Kobito to Ao Mushi

synonyms: The Dwarf and the Green Caterpillar
The Gnome and the Green Caterpillar
The Child and the Green Caterpillar

synopsis: A musical movie about a tiny village with tiny people. A tiny child fed a starving caterpillar his last rice cake. There was a race held soon after to determine who the king will be. The caterpillar had become a butterfly and as a thank you, pulled the tiny child's race car.
